subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: When U.C.L.A. played Southern California on Saturday, it was the first time Norm Chow shared a stage with Pete Carroll since the two men led the Trojans to a national championship four years ago.
snippet: When U.C.L.A. played Southern California on Saturday, it was the first time Norm Chow shared a stage with Pete Carroll since the two men led the Trojans to a national championship four years ago.
